mil6.3.12:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, atthi so padeso puratthimāya vā disāya dakkhiṇāya vā disāya pacchimāya vā disāya uttarāya vā disāya uddhaṃ vā adho vā tiriyaṃ vā, yattha nibbānaṃ sannihitan”ti?
mil6.3.12:1.2: “Natthi, mahārāja, so padeso puratthimāya vā disāya dakkhiṇāya vā disāya pacchimāya vā disāya uttarāya vā disāya uddhaṃ vā adho vā tiriyaṃ vā, yattha nibbānaṃ sannihitan”ti.
mil6.3.12:2.1: “Yadi, bhante nāgasena, natthi nibbānassa sannihitokāso, tena hi natthi nibbānaṃ?
mil6.3.12:2.2: Yesañca taṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikataṃ, tesampi sacchikiriyā micchā, kāraṇaṃ tattha vakkhāmi.
mil6.3.12:2.3: Yathā, bhante nāgasena, mahiyā dhaññuṭṭhānaṃ khettaṃ atthi, gandhuṭṭhānaṃ pupphaṃ atthi, pupphuṭṭhānaṃ gumbo atthi, phaluṭṭhānaṃ rukkho atthi, ratanuṭṭhānaṃ ākaro atthi, tattha yo koci yaṃ yaṃ icchati, so tattha gantvā taṃ taṃ harati;
mil6.3.12:2.4: evameva kho, bhante nāgasena, yadi nibbānaṃ atthi, tassa nibbānassa uṭṭhānokāsopi icchitabbo, yasmā ca kho, bhante nāgasena, nibbānassa uṭṭhānokāso natthi, tasmā natthi nibbānanti brūmi, yesañca nibbānaṃ sacchikataṃ, tesampi sacchikiriyā micchā”ti.
mil6.3.12:3.1: “Natthi, mahārāja, nibbānassa sannihitokāso, atthi cetaṃ nibbānaṃ, sammāpaṭipanno yoniso manasikārena nibbānaṃ sacchikaroti.
mil6.3.12:3.2: Yathā pana, mahārāja, atthi aggi nāma, natthi tassa sannihitokāso, dve kaṭṭhāni saṅghaṭṭento aggiṃ adhigacchati;
mil6.3.12:3.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, atthi nibbānaṃ, natthi tassa sannihitokāso, sammāpaṭipanno yoniso manasikārena nibbānaṃ sacchikaroti.
mil6.3.12:4.1: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, atthi satta ratanāni nāma.
mil6.3.12:4.3: cakkaratanaṃ hatthiratanaṃ assaratanaṃ maṇiratanaṃ itthiratanaṃ gahapatiratanaṃ pariṇāyakaratanaṃ.
mil6.3.12:4.4: Na ca tesaṃ ratanānaṃ sannihitokāso atthi, khattiyassa pana sammāpaṭipannassa paṭipattibalena tāni ratanāni upagacchanti.
mil6.3.12:4.5: Evameva kho, mahārāja, atthi nibbānaṃ, natthi tassa sannihitokāso, sammāpaṭipanno yoniso manasikārena nibbānaṃ sacchikarotī”ti.
mil6.3.12:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, nibbānassa sannihitokāso mā hotu, atthi pana taṃ ṭhānaṃ, yattha ṭhito sammāpaṭipanno nibbānaṃ sacchikarotī”ti?
mil6.3.12:5.2: “Āma, mahārāja, atthi taṃ ṭhānaṃ, yattha ṭhito sammāpaṭipanno nibbānaṃ sacchikarotī”ti.
mil6.3.12:6.1: “Katamaṃ pana, bhante, taṃ ṭhānaṃ, yattha ṭhito sammāpaṭipanno nibbānaṃ sacchikarotī”ti?
mil6.3.12:6.2: “Sīlaṃ, mahārāja, ṭhānaṃ, sīle patiṭṭhito yoniso manasikaronto sakkayavanepi cīnavilātepi alasandepi nigumbepi kāsikosalepi kasmīrepi gandhārepi nagamuddhanipi brahmalokepi yattha katthacipi ṭhito sammāpaṭipanno nibbānaṃ sacchikaroti.
mil6.3.12:6.3: Yathā, mahārāja, yo koci cakkhumā puriso sakayavanepi cīnavilātepi alasandepi nigumbepi kāsikosalepi kasmīrepi gandhārepi nagamuddhanipi brahmalokepi yattha katthacipi ṭhito ākāsaṃ passati;
mil6.3.12:6.4: evameva kho, mahārāja, sīle patiṭṭhito yoniso manasikaronto sakayavanepi …pe…
mil6.3.12:6.5: yattha katthacipi ṭhito sammāpaṭipanno nibbānaṃ sacchikaroti.
mil6.3.12:7.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, sīle patiṭṭhitassa yoniso manasikarontassa sakkayavanepi …pe…
mil6.3.12:7.4: yattha katthacipi ṭhitassa sammāpaṭipannassa atthi nibbānasacchikiriyā”ti.
mil6.3.12:7.5: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, desitaṃ tayā nibbānaṃ, desitā nibbānasacchikiriyā, parikkhatā sīlaguṇā, dassitā sammāpaṭipatti, ussāpito dhammaddhajo, saṇṭhapitā dhammanetti, avañjho suppayuttānaṃ sammāpayogo, evametaṃ gaṇivarapavara tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
